languages.text: "Я тогда, получается, буду саботажником и предателем? И то правда, ситуация-то критическая!" {n}На лице стража возникает гримаса облегчения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я тогда, получается, буду саботажником и предателем? И то правда, ситуация-то критическая!" {n}На лице стража возникает гримаса облегчения.{/n}

languages.text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я тогда, получается, буду саботажником и предателем? И то правда, ситуация-то критическая!" {n}На лице стража возникает гримаса облегчения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}
"Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}
"Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}
"Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}
"Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}
"Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

languages.text: "Na ja, das würde mich zu einem Saboteur und Verräter machen, oder? Ja, Ihr habt recht! Das ist ein Notfall!" {n}Er sieht erleichtert aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Na ja, das würde mich zu einem Saboteur und Verräter machen, oder? Ja, Ihr habt recht! Das ist ein Notfall!" {n}Er sieht erleichtert aus.{/n}

languages.text: « Ma foi, cela ferait de moi un saboteur et un traître... C'est vrai, vous avez raison. C'est un cas d'urgence ! » {n}Le jeune homme semble soulagé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi, cela ferait de moi un saboteur et un traître... C'est vrai, vous avez raison. C'est un cas d'urgence ! » {n}Le jeune homme semble soulagé.{/n}

languages.text: “是吧，如果真是这样，我不就成了坏人和叛徒了吗？是啊，您说得对！现在是紧急情况！”{n}他看起来如释重负。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是吧，如果真是这样，我不就成了坏人和叛徒了吗？是啊，您说得对！现在是紧急情况！”{n}他看起来如释重负。{/n}

languages.text: 「あの、そしたら僕は妨害者で反逆者になりますよね？わかりました！緊急事態ですもんね！」{n}青年は安堵したようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの、そしたら僕は妨害者で反逆者になりますよね？わかりました！緊急事態ですもんね！」{n}青年は安堵したようだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Bueno, eso me convertiría en un saboteador y un traidor, ¿no? ¡Sí, es cierto! ¡Es una emergencia!». {n}Parece aliviado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, eso me convertiría en un saboteador y un traidor, ¿no? ¡Sí, es cierto! ¡Es una emergencia!». {n}Parece aliviado.{/n}

languages.text: "O zaman bir sabotajcı, vatan haini olurdum, değil mi? Evet, haklısınız! Mücbir bir sebep!" {n}Rahatlamış görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, that would make me a saboteur and a traitor, wouldn't it? Yes, you're right! This is an emergency!" {n}He looks relieved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "O zaman bir sabotajcı, vatan haini olurdum, değil mi? Evet, haklısınız! Mücbir bir sebep!" {n}Rahatlamış görünüyor.{/n}
